summary: A two-parts armor (breastplate and boots) with a police design made by myself.
descriptionHtml:
A two-parts armor (breastplate and boots) with a police design made by myself. All the textures modified.

Breastplate - SPD (Skyrim Police Department) carved at the back part of the armor.
                 - Real police plate at the front of the armor.
Boots - With the same color of the breastplate and all the textures modified.

Installation:
-UnRAR the content of the archive downloaded.
-Copy it into your Skyrim Data folder.
-Say yes to replace.
-Enjoy it!

Unistallation:
-Simply delete the content of your Data-textures-armor-iron folder.

I hope to keep making better mods like that and i will probably make some updates of skyrim police uniform... since then. Enjoy it!
author: Jargu
